DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent an individual's score on the Dermatology Life Quality Index.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A medical specialty concerned with the skin, its structure, functions, diseases, and treatment. (MeSH)_Life; the organic phenomenon that distinguishes living organisms from nonliving ones._An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth._Index; a numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number._Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A medical specialty concerned with the skin, its structure, functions, diseases, and treatment.:Life; the organic phenomenon that distinguishes living organisms from nonliving ones.:Quality; a degree or grade of excellence or worth; an essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone.:Index; a numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number.

Concepts.definition: The branch of medicine focused on the study of the skin, and responsible for the medical management of its associated diseases.
Showing characteristics of life; displaying signs of life.
An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth.
A numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number; a number used to select an element of a list, vector, array or other sequence.

Property.preferredDefinition: Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools
